name: sanaciones-web

scripts.build: rimraf public/* && parcel build src/*.html --dist-dir public --no-source-maps --no-cache --public-url ./
scripts.deploy: rimraf public/* && parcel build src/*.html --dist-dir public --no-source-maps --no-cache --public-url ./ && gh-pages -d public

author: Laboratorio digital 2022 - Museo de Memoria de Colombia
